Key Match Events: Glenn Phillips scored 104 runs in 64 balls
Trent Boult took career-best figures of 4/13
Pre-Game Insights: NZ skipper Kane Williamson mentioned the wicket was different and challenging
SL skipper Dasun Shanaka praised Glenn Phillips' knock but acknowledged dropped catches and missed opportunities
Post-Match Reflections: NZ skipper Kane Williamson commented on the team's adjustments and the importance of the partnership between Phillips and Mitchell
SL skipper Dasun Shanaka stated they lost early wickets and struggled to settle on the wicket
Glenn Phillips expressed satisfaction with his innings and the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka dropped a crucial catch of Glenn Phillips
Trent Boult's performance was noted as career-best figures
The match ended with a 65-run win for New Zealand
